com.here.mobility.sdk.demand

Class DemandClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.DemandClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INetworkClient

    public class DemandClient
extends Object
implements INetworkClient
    The client class for accessing the Demand API, used for requesting, booking and managing rides.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener
      The listener interface to be implemented by the caller, to get notifications about Ride updates.

      • getRideOffers

        public ResponseFuture<List<RideOffer>> getRideOffers(RideOffersRequest request)
        Get ride offers from multiple suppliers. This request can throw the following exceptions: HMDemandInternalException HMDemandPickupTimeTooFarAheadException HMDemandPickupTimeInThePastException HMDemandMaximumWalkingDistanceNotSupportedException HMDemandInvalidNumberOfChangesException HMAuthException except HMAuthPhoneNotVerifiedException

      • createRide

        public ResponseFuture<Ride> createRide(CreateRideRequest request)
        Create a new ride. This request can throw the following exceptions: HMDemandInternalException HMDemandOfferExpiredException HMDemandMissingPaymentIdForOnlineOfferException HMDemandPaymentIdProvidedForOfflineOfferException

      • getRides

        public ResponseFuture<RideQueryResponse> getRides(RideQuery query)
        Query for rides of the current user. This request can throw the following exceptions: HMDemandInternalException HMAuthException

      • getRide

        public ResponseFuture<Ride> getRide(String rideId)
        Get a ride's details.
        Parameters:
        rideId - ID of the requested ride
        Returns:
        Ride object This request can throw the following exceptions: HMDemandInternalException HMDemandRideNotFoundException HMAuthException

      • getVerticalsCoverage

        public ResponseFuture<VerticalsCoverageResponse> getVerticalsCoverage(VerticalsCoverageRequest verticalsCoverageRequest)
        Get the verticals (transit types) coverage available around a specific location.
        Parameters:
        verticalsCoverageRequest - the verticals coverage request
        Returns:
        VerticalsCoverageResponse the response, contains a list of all available RideOffer.TransitType around the given location This request can throw the following exceptions: HMDemandInternalException HMAuthException except HMAuthPhoneNotVerifiedException

      • registerToRideUpdates

        public ResponseFuture<Void> registerToRideUpdates(DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener)
        Register for ride updates. The listener is called on the looper of the thread calling this method.
        Parameters:
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates
        Returns:
        This request has no return value. This request can throw the following exceptions: HMAuthException

                                                  Handler handler)

        Parameters:
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates
        handler - The handler on which to call the listener.

      • registerToRideUpdates

        public ResponseFuture<Void> registerToRideUpdates(String rideId,
                                                  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener)
        Register for updates of the ride with the given ID. The listener is called on the looper of the thread calling this method.
        Parameters:
        rideId - ID of the ride in whose updates you're interested
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates
        Returns:
        This request has no return value. This request can throw the following exceptions: HMAuthException

      • registerToRideUpdates

        public ResponseFuture<Void> registerToRideUpdates(String rideId,
                                                  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener,
                                                  Handler handler)
        Register for updates of the ride with the given ID. The listener will be called on the looper of the thread calling this method.
        Parameters:
        rideId - The ID of the ride in whose updates you're interested
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates
        handler - the handler on which to call the listener
        Returns:
        This request has no return value. This request can throw the following exceptions: HMAuthException

      • cancelAllActiveRequests

        public void cancelAllActiveRequests()
        Description copied from interface: INetworkClient
        Cancels all active requests this client has running. Note that this doesn't necessarily stop any underlying sending of data through the network. The only guarantee is that no response listeners will be called. Implementation note: unfortunately, GRPC stream requests provide no way to cancel them, so these are not currently cancelled.
        Specified by:
        cancelAllActiveRequests in interface INetworkClient

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from interface: INetworkClient
        Shuts down this INetworkClient. All active requests are cancelled, and the underlying channel is shutdown cleanly (requests in progress will finish, but no new ones will be accepted). Note that any streaming requests may continue indefinitely.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface INetworkClient

      • shutdownNow

        public void shutdownNow()
        Description copied from interface: INetworkClient
        Shuts down this INetworkClient immediately, forcefully closing even preexisting calls. This is the preferred method to call when using INetworkClient from an Android activity or service that is finishing, because it should guarantee that no further callbacks will be invoked.
        Specified by:
        shutdownNow in interface INetworkClient
